燕.definition: swallow (family Hirundinidae); old variant of 宴[yan4]

燕京.definition: Yanjing, an old name for Beijing; capital of Yan at different periods

燕京大學.definition: Yanjing or Yenching University, Christian university in Beijing founded in 1919

燕國.definition: Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning; north Hebei; the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕[Qian2 Yan1] (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕[Hou4 Yan1] (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕[Nan2 Yan1] (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕[Bei3 Yan1] (409-436)

燕太子丹.definition: Prince Dan of Yan (-226 BC), commissioned the attempted assassination of King Ying Zheng of Qin 秦嬴政[Qin2 Ying2 Zheng4] (later the First Emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]) by Jing Ke 荊軻|荆轲[Jing1 Ke1] in 227 BC

燕子銜泥壘大窩.pinyin: yan4 zi5 xian2 ni2 lei3 da4 wo1
燕子銜泥壘大窩.definition: the swallow's nest is built one beakful of mud at a time (idiom); many a little makes a mickle

燕山.definition: Yan mountain range across north Hebei

燕科.definition: Hirundinidae (the family of swallows and martins)

燕趙.definition: Yan and Zhao, two of the Warring States in Hebei and Shanxi; beautiful women; women dancers and singers

燕隼.definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian hobby (Falco subbuteo)

燕雀.definition: (bird species of China) brambling (Fringilla montifringilla); (fig.) small fry

燕雀安知鴻鵠之志.pinyin: yan4 que4 an1 zhi1 hong2 hu2 zhi1 zhi4
燕雀安知鴻鵠之志.definition: lit. can the sparrow and swallow know the will of the great swan? (idiom); fig. how can we small fry predict the ambitions of the great?

燕雀焉知鴻鵠之志.pinyin: yan4 que4 yan1 zhi1 hong2 gu3 zhi1 zhi4
燕雀焉知鴻鵠之志.definition: lit. can the sparrow and swallow know the will of the great swan? (idiom); fig. how can we small fry predict the ambitions of the great?

燕雀相賀.definition: lit. sparrow and swallow's congratulation (idiom); fig. to congratulate sb on completion of a building project; congratulations on your new house!

燕雀處堂.definition: lit. a caged bird in a pavilion (idiom); fig. to lose vigilance by comfortable living; unaware of the disasters ahead; a fool's paradise
